title: Alistar finally has a real biography.
body:
Riot just keeps making my year better and better.

https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/champion/alistar/

Alistar's new bio is basically the same as his old one, but with far more content and details. It goes into how the Minotaurs sided with Noxus, how Alistar was captured, and how it affected him. More importantly though, it gives more insight into his friendship with Ayelia and their escape.

Hopefully he'll receive a color story, and maybe even a VO update, sometime in the future.

replies.body:
> More importantly though, it gives more incite into his friendship with Ayelia and their escape.

She was part of his old lore?
Yep. She helped him escape in his old lore as well, but it was never really explained how she did it or what happened to her after.
Then Riot has my respect for respecting the old canon.
I think Rachel Harrison did a great job with this update. She's a very talented author, and we were lucky to be able to work with her on League lore.
